## LayoutComponentDirective interface

Type of the Layout metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LayoutComponentDirective 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [componentFactoryResolver](./ng.layoutcomponentdirective.componentfactoryresolver.md) | <code>ComponentFactoryResolver</code> | The optional component factory resolver used to instantiate the component |
|  [layoutMode](./ng.layoutcomponentdirective.layoutmode.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | An optional layout mode used with a default layout mapping. |
|  [mappingId](./ng.layoutcomponentdirective.mappingid.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | ID of the content item, content type or the content type name used for a default layout mapping. If the ID is not given, this layout will not be mapped by default. |
|  [selector](./ng.layoutcomponentdirective.selector.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | Defines the mapping between the layout controller to the layout implementation. If this property is missing, the selector of the component will be used instead. |
